item.title: Capcom TGS 2025 Online Special Program contents detailed
item.content:encoded:
Updates on PRAGMATA, Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection, and more.

Capcom has detailed the contents of its “Tokyo Game Show 2025 Capcom Online Special Program,” which will air on September 24 at 7:00 a.m. PT / 10:00 a.m. ET.

Here are the details:

Information on the newest Capcom titles!

  • PRAGMATA – See the latest updates on PRAGMATA, set to launch in 2026.
  • Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection – See the latest updates on Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection, set to launch in 2026.
  • Street Fighter 6 – See the latest information on C. Viper, the second additional character for Year 3 of Street Fighter 6.
  • Onimusha: Way of the Sword – See the latest footage of Onimusha: Way of the Sword.
  • Monster Hunter Wilds – See the latest information on Monster Hunter Wilds Free Title Update 3, set to launch in late September 2025.
  • Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection – Series producer Ryozo Tsujimoto and game director Kenji Oguro will bring you the latest information and highlights of Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection.

There will be no new information regarding Resident Evil Requiem.

Tokyo Game Show 2025 will run from September 25 to 28 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan.

Watch a teaser trailer below.

Teaser Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Brave x Junction launches October 8 for PS5 and PS4, October 9 for Switch and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Blackjack RPG gets a release date.

Blackjack RPG Brave x Junction will launch for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on October 8, and for Switch and PC via Steam on October 9, developer RideonJapan announced. It will be priced at 1,650 yen (western pricing to be announced).

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Brave x Junction is an RPG where you battle monsters in a back-and-forth contest of blackjack, the playing card game familiar to many.

Defeat the monsters and delve dungeons. A fun tale of adventure all while being simple to play.

Key Features

  • Blackjack Style Turn-Based Battle System
    • Battles are a one-on-one turn-based system.
    • Who has the closest number to 21 in their hand? They deal an attack to the opponent!
    • Three distinctive playable characters make an appearance: The Fighter, with a head on battle-like creed; the Thief, unrivaled in sensing danger and thwarting it; and the Magician, who employs trickery at will!
    • Leave your strategy to chance? Entrap the enemy with trickery? The way you enjoy is up to you, the player.
  • Diverse Array of Monsters
    • Slimes, orcs, dragons, and monsters, familiar to fantasy RPGs all lurk out of the depths, one after another.
    • Card hand concealing ghosts, trolls that surpass the 21-card value limit, and many more with a diverse array of skills stand in the way of the player.
    • Monsters from RideonJapan’s Adventure Bar Story and Mercenaries Saga series games even make an appearance!
  • Loads of Factors to Augment, Unfolding a Blackjack Victory
    • Acquire boost cards as you advance the adventure, strengthening status and learning skills.
    • Abilities come along with some weapons and accessories, and at the Armory & Forge in town, synthesis can allow for unbound customization.
    • Combining skills with abilities? This could bring to life new tactics.
    • Can you traverse the untrodden dungeons? It’s all up to you, the player!


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/brave-x-junction-launches-october-8-for-ps5-and-ps4-october-9-for-switch-and-pc
